_header: The feast of midwinters day is of much price
_description: The Feast of the Nativity in one MS of the South English Legendary

BLEge2810.First Lines: Þe feste of midewinteris dai is of muche pris& þat vor vale enchesouns þat þo uelle ywis…
BLEge2810.Last Lines: …þer ȝe solle finde a childe ylore king of alle kingeof wan ȝe desireþ so muche to wite of som tokning
